adaptability.name: Adaptability
adaptability.desc: Powers up moves of the same type as the Pokémon.

aftermath.name: Aftermath
aftermath.desc: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit.

analytic.name: Analytic
analytic.desc: Power is increased if the Pokémon would attack last.

anger-point.name: Anger Point
anger-point.desc: Raises Attack upon taking a critical hit.

aroma-veil.name: Aroma Veil
aroma-veil.desc: Protects allies from attacks that effect their mental state.

aura-break.name: Aura Break
aura-break.desc: The effects of Aura Abilities are reversed.

battle-armor.name: Battle Armor
battle-armor.desc: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

big-pecks.name: Big Pecks
big-pecks.desc: The Pokémon's defense stat cannot be reduced.

blaze.name: Blaze
blaze.desc: Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch.

bulletproof.name: Bulletproof
bulletproof.desc: Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.

cheek-pouch.name: Cheek Pouch
cheek-pouch.desc: Restores HP as well when the Pokémon eats a Berry.

chlorophyll.name: Chlorophyll
chlorophyll.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

clear-body.name: Clear Body
clear-body.desc: Prevents the Pokémon's stats from being lowered.

color-change.name: Color Change
color-change.desc: Changes the Pokémon's type to the foe's move.

competitive.name: Competitive
competitive.desc: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat when a stat is lowered.

cursed-body.name: Cursed Body
cursed-body.desc: When attacked, the move used may become disabled.

cute-charm.name: Cute Charm
cute-charm.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

dark-aura.name: Dark Aura
dark-aura.desc: Powers up each Pokémon's Dark-type moves.

defeatist.name: Defeatist
defeatist.desc: When HP is below 50% of maximum, Attack power decreases.

defiant.name: Defiant
defiant.desc: As other stats are decreased, Attack increases.

download.name: Download
download.desc: Adjusts power according to the foe's ability.

drizzle.name: Drizzle
drizzle.desc: The Pokémon makes it rain if it appears in battle.

drought.name: Drought
drought.desc: The Pokémon makes it sunny if it is in battle.

dry-skin.name: Dry Skin
dry-skin.desc: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.

early-bird.name: Early Bird
early-bird.desc: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.

effect-spore.name: Effect Spore
effect-spore.desc: Contact may paralyze, poison, or cause sleep.

fairy-aura.name: Fairy Aura
fairy-aura.desc: Powers up each Pokémon's Fairy-type moves.

flame-body.name: Flame Body
flame-body.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the foe.

flare-boost.name: Flare Boost
flare-boost.desc: Power is increased when afflicted with the Burn status condition.

flash-fire.name: Flash Fire
flash-fire.desc: Powers up Fire-type moves if hit by a fire move.

flower-gift.name: Flower Gift
flower-gift.desc: Powers up party Pokémon when it is sunny.

flower-veil.name: Flower Veil
flower-veil.desc: Prevents lowering of ally Grass-type Pokémon's stats.

forewarn.name: Forewarn
forewarn.desc: Determines what moves the foe has.

friend-guard.name: Friend Guard
friend-guard.desc: Damage taken by allies may be reduced. (Assumed)

frisk.name: Frisk
frisk.desc: The Pokémon can check the foe's held item.

gluttony.name: Gluttony
gluttony.desc: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

gooey.name: Gooey
gooey.desc: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

grass-pelt.name: Grass Pelt
grass-pelt.desc: Boosts the Defense stat when the terrain is grass.

guts.name: Guts
guts.desc: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.

harvest.name: Harvest
harvest.desc: A held berry can be reused. (Assumed)

heatproof.name: Heatproof
heatproof.desc: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.

heavy-metal.name: Heavy Metal
heavy-metal.desc: The Pokémon weighs twice as much as normal.

honey-gather.name: Honey Gather
honey-gather.desc: The Pokémon may gather Honey from somewhere.

hustle.name: Hustle
hustle.desc: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

hydration.name: Hydration
hydration.desc: Heals status problems if it is raining.

hyper-cutter.name: Hyper Cutter
hyper-cutter.desc: Prevents the Attack stat from being lowered.

ice-body.name: Ice Body
ice-body.desc: The Pokémon regains HP in a hailstorm.

illuminate.name: Illuminate
illuminate.desc: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon.

illusion.name: Illusion
illusion.desc: Takes the appearance of an ally when it enters battle.

immunity.name: Immunity
immunity.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.

imposter.name: Imposter
imposter.desc: Upon entering battle the Pokémon uses Transform

infiltrator.name: Infiltrator
infiltrator.desc: The effects of Barrier and Light Screen.

inner-focus.name: Inner Focus
inner-focus.desc: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

insomnia.name: Insomnia
insomnia.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

iron-barbs.name: Iron Barbs
iron-barbs.desc: Inflicts damage on the opponent when Physical contact is made.

iron-fist.name: Iron Fist
iron-fist.desc: Boosts the power of punching moves.

justified.name: Justified
justified.desc: Attack is boosted when hit by a Dark-type move.

keen-eye.name: Keen Eye
keen-eye.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from losing accuracy.

klutz.name: Klutz
klutz.desc: The Pokémon can't use any held items.

leaf-guard.name: Leaf Guard
leaf-guard.desc: Prevents status problems in sunny weather.

levitate.name: Levitate
levitate.desc: Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

light-metal.name: Light Metal
light-metal.desc: The Pokémon weighs half as much as normal.

lightningrod.name: Lightningrod
lightningrod.desc: The Pokémon draws in all Electric-type moves.

limber.name: Limber
limber.desc: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

liquid-ooze.name: Liquid Ooze
liquid-ooze.desc: Inflicts damage on foes using any draining move.

magic-bounce.name: Magic Bounce
magic-bounce.desc: The Pokémon reflects non-damaging moves back at their user.

magic-guard.name: Magic Guard
magic-guard.desc: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

magician.name: Magician
magician.desc: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.

magma-armor.name: Magma Armor
magma-armor.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming frozen.

marvel-scale.name: Marvel Scale
marvel-scale.desc: Boosts Defense if there is a status problem.

mega-launcher.name: Mega Launcher
mega-launcher.desc: Powers up aura and pulse moves.

minus.name: Minus
minus.desc: Boosts Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus.

mold-breaker.name: Mold Breaker
mold-breaker.desc: Moves can be used regardless of abilities.

moody.name: Moody
moody.desc: One stat is reduced in favor of another stat.

motor-drive.name: Motor Drive
motor-drive.desc: Raises Speed if hit by an Electric-type move.

moxie.name: Moxie
moxie.desc: The Pokémon's attack stat is boosted when its opponent is knocked out.

multiscale.name: Multiscale
multiscale.desc: The higher the HP, the less the damage taken from foes.

multitype.name: Multitype
multitype.desc: Changes type to match the held Plate.

mummy.name: Mummy
mummy.desc: When an opponent uses a Physical attack, its ability also becomes Mummy.

natural-cure.name: Natural Cure
natural-cure.desc: All status problems are healed upon switching out.

no-guard.name: No Guard
no-guard.desc: Ensures the Pokémon and its foe's attacks land.

normalize.name: Normalize
normalize.desc: All the Pokémon's moves become the Normal type.

oblivious.name: Oblivious
oblivious.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming infatuated.

overcoat.name: Overcoat
overcoat.desc: The Pokémon does not take damage from primary Weather effects.

overgrow.name: Overgrow
overgrow.desc: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.

own-tempo.name: Own Tempo
own-tempo.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

pickpocket.name: Pickpocket
pickpocket.desc: The Pokémon steals an opponent's item when contact is made.

pick-up.name: Pickup
pick-up.desc: The Pokémon may pick up items.

plus.name: Plus
plus.desc: Boosts Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Minus.

poison-heal.name: Poison Heal
poison-heal.desc: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.

poison-point.name: Poison Point
poison-point.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the foe.

poison-touch.name: Poison Touch
poison-touch.desc: An opponent is afflicted with the Poison status condition upon contact.

prankster.name: Prankster
prankster.desc: When a non-damaging move is used its priority is increased.

pressure.name: Pressure
pressure.desc: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

protean.name: Protean
protean.desc: Changes the Pokémon's type to the type of the move it just used.

pure-power.name: Pure Power
pure-power.desc: Boosts the power of physical attacks.

quick-feet.name: Quick Feet
quick-feet.desc: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.

rain-dish.name: Rain Dish
rain-dish.desc: The Pokémon gradually recovers HP in rain.

rattled.name: Rattled
rattled.desc: Types of certain opponents make the Pokémon self-conscious, it raises its Speed.

reckless.name: Reckless
reckless.desc: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

regenerator.name: Regenerator
regenerator.desc: When the Pokémon is switched out of battle, some of its HP is restored.

rivalry.name: Rivalry
rivalry.desc: Raises Attack if the foe is of the same gender.

rock-head.name: Rock Head
rock-head.desc: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

rough-skin.name: Rough Skin
rough-skin.desc: Inflicts damage to the foe on contact.

run-away.name: Run Away
run-away.desc: Enables sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

sand-force.name: Sand Force
sand-force.desc: Boosts the Attack of the Pokémon's Ground, Rock and Steel type moves in a SandStorm.

sand-rush.name: Sand Rush
sand-rush.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in a SandStorm.

sand-stream.name: Sand Stream
sand-stream.desc: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm in battle.

sand-veil.name: Sand Veil
sand-veil.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.

sap-sipper.name: Sap Sipper
sap-sipper.desc: Attack power is boosted if the Pokémon is hit by a Grass-type attack.

scrappy.name: Scrappy
scrappy.desc: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type foes.

serene-grace.name: Serene Grace
serene-grace.desc: Boosts the likelihood of added effects appearing.

shed-skin.name: Shed Skin
shed-skin.desc: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.

sheer-force.name: Sheer Force
sheer-force.desc: Attack power of moves is boosted but their secondary effects do not occur.

shell-armor.name: Shell Armor
shell-armor.desc: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

shield-dust.name: Shield Dust
shield-dust.desc: Blocks the added effects of attacks taken.

simple.name: Simple
simple.desc: The Pokémon is prone to wild stat changes.

skill-link.name: Skill Link
skill-link.desc: Increases the frequency of multi-strike moves.

sniper.name: Sniper
sniper.desc: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

snow-warning.name: Snow Warning
snow-warning.desc: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm in battle.

solar-power.name: Solar Power
solar-power.desc: Boosts Sp. Atk, but lowers HP in sunshine.

soundproof.name: Soundproof
soundproof.desc: Gives full immunity to all sound-based moves.

speed-boost.name: Speedboost
speed-boost.desc: The Pokémon's Speed stat is gradually boosted.

stall.name: Stall
stall.desc: The Pokémon moves after even slower foes.

stance-change.name: Stance Change
stance-change.desc: The Pokémon changes form depending on how it battles.

static.name: Static
static.desc: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.

steadfast.name: Steadfast
steadfast.desc: Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches.

stench.name: Stench
stench.desc: The stench helps keep wild Pokémon away.

sticky-hold.name: Sticky Hold
sticky-hold.desc: Protects the Pokémon from item theft.

storm-drain.name: Storm Drain
storm-drain.desc: The Pokémon draws in all Water-type moves.

strong-jaw.name: Strong Jaw
strong-jaw.desc: The Pokémon's strong jaw gives it tremendous biting power.

sturdy.name: Sturdy
sturdy.desc: The Pokémon is protected against 1-hit KO attacks.

suction-cups.name: Suction Cups
suction-cups.desc: Negates moves that force switching out.

super-luck.name: Super Luck
super-luck.desc: Heightens the critical-hit ratios of moves.

swarm.name: Swarm
swarm.desc: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.

sweet-veil.name: Sweet Veil
sweet-veil.desc: Prevents ally Pokémon from falling asleep.

swift-swim.name: Swift Swim
swift-swim.desc: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

symbiosis.name: Symbiosis
symbiosis.desc: The Pokémon can pass an item to an ally.

synchronize.name: Synchronize
synchronize.desc: Passes on a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.

tangled-feet.name: Tangled Feet
tangled-feet.desc: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.

technician.name: Technician
technician.desc: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.

teravolt.name: TeraVolt
teravolt.desc: Moves ignore the effects of abilities.

thick-fat.name: Thick Fat
thick-fat.desc: Raises resistance to Fire-and Ice-type moves.

tinted-lens.name: Tinted Lens
tinted-lens.desc: Powers up not very effective moves.

torrent.name: Torrent
torrent.desc: Powers up Water-type moves in a pinch.

tough-claws.name: Tough Claws
tough-claws.desc: Powers up moves that make direct contact.

toxic-boost.name: Toxic Boost
toxic-boost.desc: Power is increased when afflicted with the Poison status condition.

trace.name: Trace
trace.desc: The Pokémon copies the foe's ability.

truant.name: Truant
truant.desc: The Pokémon can't attack on consecutive turns.

turboblaze.name: TurboBlaze
turboblaze.desc: Moves ignore the effects of abilities.

unaware.name: Unaware
unaware.desc: Ignores any change in ability by the foe.

unburden.name: Unburden
unburden.desc: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

unnerve.name: Unnerve
unnerve.desc: Opponents are unable to eat their held berries.

victory-star.name: Victory Star
victory-star.desc: Increases the accuracy of the Pokémon and its partners.

vital-spirit.name: Vital Spirit
vital-spirit.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

volt-absorb.name: Volt Absorb
volt-absorb.desc: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.

water-absorb.name: Water Absorb
water-absorb.desc: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.

water-veil.name: Water Veil
water-veil.desc: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

weak-armor.name: Weak Armor
weak-armor.desc: When hit by a Physical attack the Pokémon's Attack is decreased and Speed is increased.

white-smoke.name: White Smoke
white-smoke.desc: Prevents the Pokémon's stats from being lowered.

wonder-skin.name: Wonder Skin
wonder-skin.desc: Is unaffected by opponents' moves that alter stats. (Assumed)

zen-mode.name: Zen Mode
zen-mode.desc: Changes Daruma Forme in a pinch.
